title: Virgin Islands National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 8 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Virgin Islands National Park Lionfish Snorkel Safari      Time: 1:30 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Snorkeling will take place at Salomon Bay.  Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/19/2016 to 08/14/2016 Meet at the Lind Point Trailhead.  View Details      Virgin Islands National Park Annaberg Historic Site Cultural Demonstrations      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Annaberg Ruins, Leinster Bay Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 07/18/2016 to 08/31/2016 The subsistence lifestyle is presented with gardening skills as demonstrated by native St. Johnians. A walk around the ruins allows allow visualization of the colonial "sugar" era.  View Details      Virgin Islands National Park Reef Bay Hike      Time: 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM Location: Meet at the Visitor Center Fees: $40     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 04/29/2016 to 08/29/2016 Step back in time while experiencing a moist tropical forest as you hike down the verdant Reef Bay Valley. View Details      Virgin Islands National Park Night Sky Watch      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Concordia Resort, Salt Pond Bay Fees: No Fee     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Explore the dark skies of Virgin Islands National Park with Paul Tierney and a Park Ranger.  View Details      Virgin Islands National Park Reminiscing; Past & Present      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Annaberg Sugar Mill Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Virgin Islands National Park celebrates the life, and culture of the people of the Virgin Islands. View Details      Virgin Islands National Park Discover Bird Watching      Time: 7:30 AM to 9:00 AM Location: Francis Bay Trailhead Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 01/08/2016 to 11/25/2016 The location of this program is the best overall place to see birds on St. John. It is excellent for viewing migratory and native species.  View Details      Virgin Islands National Park NPS Birthday      Location: Trunk Bay Fees: No Fees     Thursday, August 25, 2016 No Fees charged at Trunk for the Centennial Birthday of the National Park.  View Details      Virgin Islands National Park "Adopt-A-Beach" for turtle nest monitoring.      Time: 9:00 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Virgin Islands National Park Visitor Center     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Spread the word! Volunteers needed for "Adopt-A-Beach" for turtle nest monitoring.
